snippet.title: Schildmaid MX Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
Use advanced shield technology to defend your planet from a fast approaching armada in a fresh, upcoming shmup! Schildmaid MX is coming to Windows PC, macOS and Linux on November 4th 2021 - via Itch.io - with more platforms to be announced. Visit the store page for more info: https://hitp-studio.itch.io/schildmaid-mx

In Schildmaid MX you don't avoid bullets, you embrace them! The game contains...

- 3 unlockable main game modes
- multiple, constantly evolving loops
- secret bosses!
- 3 (or more..?) playable ships
- adaptive difficulty
- a deep scoring system
- online leaderboards
- lush 2D pixel graphics
- irresistably catchy music
- and a host of other features!

Add Schildmaid MX by HitP Studio to your Collection here to get notified as soon as it's available: https://hitp-studio.itch.io/schildmaid-mx
